body: This section presents the aquatic eidolon base form, eidolon models to quickly build thematic creatures, and new evolutions. It also includes the broodmaster, evolutionist, master summoner, and synthesist archetypes.
url: pfsrd://Ultimate Magic/Rules/Spellcasting Class Options/Spellcasting Class Options/Spellcaster Class Archetypes/Summoner
name: Summoner
